message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.SI. 

This paper discusses the task of semantic relation classification in Natural Language Processing, which falls under the sub-category of Computational Linguistics (cs.CL). The paper also proposes an alternative semantic relation model based on ontology, which involves machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques (cs.AI, cs.LG). The task of semantic relation classification also has relevance in information retrieval (cs.IR) and could potentially be applied in social media analysis (cs.SI).
